entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning and early this afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
